Reviews.Title: “well worth considering”
Reviews.Author: davidForres
Reviews.Content: hotel situated ostbahnhof berlins major stations didnt hear trains 6night stay hotel offers clean excellent buffet breakfast included price paid real bonus free travel pass enabled travel outstanding public transport system potsdam staff reception extremely friendly fluent english slight drawback sound feet corridor overhead presumably guests breakfast

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel - OK Price”
Reviews.Author: ChristerTravel
Reviews.Content: hotel located railway station east ostbahnhof price ok standard plus ok bed bathroom railway subway included minus pay extra breakfast seriously overpriced instead train stroll breakfast restaurant online using hotspots found shopping

Reviews.Title: “Good for airport and the city”
Reviews.Author: RobertULondon
Reviews.Content: flew schoenefeld airport train ostbahnhof cheap city picked hotel price hotel shopping centre bit odd obviously useful shopping nice night wouldnt stay week feels bit claustrophobic living shopping centre bad health friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ReefyReef
Reviews.Content: excellent value money discounted rate included located train station access fast food resurants supermarkets located basement level beware 23 tv channels english rest channel german

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value for money - free rail card was icing on cake”
Reviews.Author: Ria16
Reviews.Content: city break 3 nights absolutely recommend hotel value money ideally located ostbahnhof train station sightseeing simple clean breakfast id definitely recommend hotel staff helpful friendly

HotelInfo.Name: InterCity Hotel Berlin
HotelInfo.Address: Am Ostbahnhof 5, 10243 Berlin, Germany
